summary.name: summary
summary.value: Zend_Gdata returns an error when trying to authenticate

description.name: description
description.value:
2010-04-30T16:11:55+04:00 ERR (3): exception 'Zend_Gdata_App_HttpException' with message 'Expected response code 200, got 400 Invalid UserId private' in /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Gdata/App.php:700 Stack trace: #0 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Gdata.php(219): Zend_Gdata_App->performHttpRequest('GET', 'http://www.goog...', Array, NULL, NULL, NULL) #1 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Gdata/App.php(861): Zend_Gdata->performHttpRequest('GET', 'http://www.goog...', Array) #2 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Gdata/App.php(754): Zend_Gdata_App->get('http://www.goog...', NULL) #3 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Gdata/App.php(205): Zend_Gdata_App->importUrl('http://www.goog...', 'Zend_Gdata_Cale...', NULL) #4 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Gdata.php(162): Zend_Gdata_App->getFeed('http://www.goog...', 'Zend_Gdata_Cale...') #5 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Gdata/Calendar.php(107): Zend_Gdata->getFeed('http://www.goog...', 'Zend_Gdata_Cale...') #6 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/library/GCalendar.php(71): Zend_Gdata_Calendar->getCalendarEventFeed(Object(Zend_Gdata_Calendar_EventQuery)) #7 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/library/GCalendar.php(109): GCalendar->events_count(Object(Zend_Date), Object(Zend_Date)) #8 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/library/GCalendar.php(189): GCalendar->add_event_with_restriction('???????????? 96...', '???????????????...', Object(Zend_Date), Object(Zend_Date)) #9 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/application/models/Forwarder.php(75): GCalendar->add_buy_event('???????????? 96...', '???????????????...') #10 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/application/models/Job.php(140): Default_Model_Forwarder->processMailQueue() #11 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/application/models/Job.php(101): Default_Model_Job->job_forwarder() #12 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/application/controllers/ActionsController.php(35): Default_Model_Job->run() #13 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/application/controllers/ActionsController.php(46): ActionsController->runJob('GCALFORWARDER', 'true') #14 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Controller/Action.php(513): ActionsController->forwardAction() #15 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Controller/Dispatcher/Standard.php(289): Zend_Controller_Action->dispatch('forwardAction') #16 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Controller/Front.php(954): Zend_Controller_Dispatcher_Standard->dispatch(Object(Zend_Controller_Request_Http), Object(Zend_Controller_Response_Http)) #17 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Application/Bootstrap/Bootstrap.php(97): Zend_Controller_Front->dispatch() #18 /usr/local/lib/ZendFramework-1.10.4/library/Zend/Application.php(366): Zend_Application_Bootstrap_Bootstrap->run() #19 /home/trial/Projects/numbers/mysite/public/index.php(32): Zend_Application->run() #20 {main}

This issue in ZF versions later 1.8.5

value.name: Zend_Gdata
value.description: Class interface to Google Data API's.

value.body: You might want to add the code resulting in this exception, but it looks like you're mixing the {{user}} and {{visibility}} option when querying for events.
